directions: Preheat cooking oil in a large frying pan over medium heat.
Add in bacon and cook until browned, transfer to a bowl.
Add garlic to the remaining oil and cook over medium heat until lightly browned.
Add in zucchini strips and cook for 1 minute, then add in cooked bacon and mix well.
Off the heat, then add in grated lemon zest and grated parmesan, toss to mix well.
Season to taste with salt and ground black pepper.
title: Stir-Fried Zucchini Noodle with Bacon and Parmesan (for Atkins Diet Phase 1)
